        Returns default value of Switch turn off For Later Use : On or OFF By default this is null
        Returns:
        Integer value

      • setSwitchTurnOffColor

        public void setSwitchTurnOffColor(java.lang.Integer mSwitchTurnOffColor)
        Set the default value of Switch turn off For Later Use : On or OFF By default this is null
        Parameters:
        mSwitchTurnOffColor - Integer value to override default
